snippet: Mississippi defensive lineman Robert Nkemdiche, who was hospitalized over the weekend, was charged with possession of marijuana.
abstract: Mississippi defensive lineman Robert Nkemdiche, who was hospitalized after injuring himself at Atlanta hotel, is charged with possession of marijuana; other college sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mississippi defensive lineman Robert Nkemdiche, who was hospitalized over the weekend, was charged with possession of marijuana.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | College Sports; Ole Miss Star Is Charged
